attributes.action: Independent investigations into police handling of illegal fox hunting.
attributes.background: Investigate why there's a police bias when present towards fox hunters and terrier men on hunt meets and an obstruction of hunt sabatouers trying to prevent kills or monitors simply monitoring to provide evidence in the event of a kill.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something that the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for. The Independent Police Complaints Commission, not the Government or Parliament, conducts independent investigations of the police. You can find out more about the IPCC, including how to make a complaint, here:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/complaints
